Yonkers.Abner Concklin House:
The Abner Concklin House (also known as Old Yellow House) is a historic house located at Closter Road in Palisades, Rockland County, New York.


== Description and history ==
It was built in about 1859, and is a small, two-story frame residence, three bays wide, with later rear wings and alterations dating to about 1920. It features a hipped roof with a monitor-like cap at the apex.
